index.html.title: Devices synchronization for Unity | DevicesSyncUnity documentation
index.html.keywords: Devices synchronization for Unity Synchronize devices information in real time through Unity Networking . This project has been developed as part of the master thesis of Erwan Normand and was supported by the TS - cole de Technologie Suprieure . Features Devices sync their touches information. Devices sync their acceleration information. Server keeps the latest information from all devices client and send them to every new connected device client A debug display that show connected devices and their touches information in real time. Installation Make sure the tcp/udp port you're going to use is open on your firewall Clone and build the repo directly on your Unity project Test Connect a mobile device on the same local network than your PC Build and run the Assets/DevicesSyncUnity/Scene/MobileSync.unity scene on the mobile device and on the PC Use the HUD to host on the PC and to connect as client with the mobile device Touch the mobile device and see the touches on the PC screen Usage Set up the NetworkManager on your scene Optionally use Assets/DevicesSyncUnity/Prefabs/NetworkManagerHUD.prefab as replacement of the default Unity's NetworkManagerHUD Drag and drop to scene the Assets/DevicesSyncUnity/Prefabs/{DeviceInfoSync, AccelerationSync, TouchesSync}.prefab prefabs and configure them Optionally use Assets/DevicesSyncUnity/Prefabs/DevicesSyncDisplay.prefab to debug the prefab Documentation The documentation of available online: https://enormand.github.io/DevicesSyncUnity/ License See the LICENSE file for license rights and limitations (3-clause BSD license).

api/DevicesSyncUnity.Messages.html.title: Namespace DevicesSyncUnity.Messages | DevicesSyncUnity documentation
api/DevicesSyncUnity.Messages.html.keywords: Namespace DevicesSyncUnity.Messages Classes AccelerationEventInfo Copy of the UnityEngine.AccelerationEvent structure, usable for network messages. AccelerationMessage Message that contains device's accelerations and acceleration events from current and previous frames. DeviceConnectedMessage DeviceDisconnectedMessage DeviceInfoMessage Message that contains device static UnityEngine.Input and UnityEngine.Camera.main information. DeviceOrientationMessage Message that contains device orientations from current and previous frames. DevicesSyncMessage Base class for messages used by DevicesSync . MessageType Container class for networking messages ids used in DevicesSync . TouchesMessage Message that contains device touches information from current frame, and touches average information from previous frames. TouchInfo Copy of the UnityEngine.Touch structure, usable for network messages.
